title: Spec: Compare Parquet vs faiss-cpu for vector storage
description:
Evaluate and compare different vector storage options:
1. Parquet for embeddings storage
2. faiss-cpu for vector indexing
3. Performance benchmarks (read/write, query speed)
4. Storage efficiency and file sizes
5. Integration complexity
6. Recommend best approach for this use case
close_reason: Completed comparison of vector storage options

title: Refactor: Move embeddings generation to CLI command instead of constructor
description:
Move embedding generation out of the constructor to a separate CLI command. This will:
1. Improve startup time by not generating embeddings on every initialization
2. Allow users to explicitly generate/update embeddings when needed
3. Separate concerns between initialization and embedding computation
close_reason: Refactored embeddings generation to separate CLI command

title: Spec: Design metadata storage for RAG system
description:
Design metadata storage architecture for RAG pipeline:
1. Document source tracking (file path, URL, timestamp, etc.)
2. Embedding index mapping (vector ID to document/chunk)
3. Chunked text storage (full text vs references)
4. Return text index for retrieval results
5. Compare storage approaches (SQLite, JSON, Parquet, separate files)
6. Query patterns and access efficiency
7. Recommend optimal metadata storage strategy

title: Spec: Replace JSON embeddings with faiss-cpu and support multiple documents for RAG
description:
Design and document approach for:
1. Using faiss-cpu for vector storage instead of JSON serialization
2. Supporting multiple documents in RAG pipeline
3. Document indexing, retrieval, and management strategies
4. Performance and scalability considerations
